name: 自然森系
description: 柔和大地色系，清新治愈，适合生活类内容

h2.base: margin: 28px 0 12px; font-size: 1.5em; line-height: 1.4; border-left: 4px solid #86efac; padding-left: 12px;

code.block: color: #374151; background: #f0fdf4; border-radius: 12px; border: 1px solid #bbf7d0; margin: 1.2em 0; padding: 1.2em; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.7; white-space: pre-wrap;
code.inline: background: #dcfce7; padding: 2px 8px; border-radius: 6px; color: #166534; font-size: 14px; border: none;

styles.quote: border-left: 4px solid #86efac; border-radius: 0 12px 12px 0; padding: 16px 20px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f0fdf4 0%, #fefce8 100%); margin: 1.2em 0; color: #57534e; font-style: italic; word-wrap: break-word;
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1.5em auto; display: block; border-radius: 16px; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.12);
styles.link: color: #16a34a; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 2px solid #86efac; transition: all 0.2s ease;

emphasis.em: font-style: italic; color: #78716c; background: linear-gradient(180deg, transparent 65%, #fef08a 65%);

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1.2em 0; border-collapse: collapse; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden;
table.header: background: #dcfce7; font-weight: 600; color: #166534; font-size: 1em; padding: 12px; border-bottom: 2px solid #86efac;
table.cell: border: 1px solid #bbf7d0; padding: 12px; color: #57534e; font-size: 1em; background: #fefce8;

styles.hr: border: none; height: 2px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #bbf7d0, #fef08a, #bbf7d0); margin: 28px 0; border-radius: 1px;

footnote.ref: color: #16a34a; text-decoration: none; font-size: 0.85em; vertical-align: super;
